name: Husk Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can’t speak

traits.name: Curse of the Husk
traits.desc: A humanoid slain by a melee attack from the zombie revives as a husk zombie on its next turn.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zombie makes two claw attacks. For each of these attacks that reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the zombie can make an additional claw attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
